statements: SELECT * FROM vaccination_records;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM vaccination_records;
SELECT patient_name, vaccine_type FROM vaccination_records WHERE patient_age > 18;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_records WHERE vaccination_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM vaccination_records ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT record_id, patient_name, patient_age, vaccination_date, vaccine_type FROM vaccination_records WHERE patient_age > 18 ORDER BY vaccination_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, vaccine_type, vaccination_date FROM vaccination_records WHERE patient_age < 50 ORDER BY patient_age DESC
SELECT * FROM vaccination_records WHERE vaccine_type = 'Pfizer' ORDER BY vaccination_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, vaccination_date FROM vaccination_records WHERE patient_age >= 60 ORDER BY vaccination_date DESC
SELECT record_id, patient_name, patient_age, vaccine_type FROM vaccination_records ORDER BY vaccination_date ASC, patient_age DESC
SELECT * FROM vaccinations;
SELECT vaccine_name, vaccination_date FROM vaccinations WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT patient_id, vaccine_name, vaccination_date FROM vaccinations WHERE vaccination_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vaccinations WHERE vaccine_name = 'Pfizer' AND vaccination_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, vaccine_name FROM vaccinations WHERE vaccination_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patients.name, vaccinations.vaccine_name FROM patients JOIN vaccinations ON patients.patient_id = vaccinations.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_records;
SELECT person_id, vaccine_type FROM vaccination_records WHERE person_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT person_id, age, gender, vaccination_status FROM population_demographics WHERE vaccination_status = TRUE;
SELECT location_city, location_state FROM vaccination_locations WHERE location_state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM vaccination_records WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT person_id, vaccination_date FROM vaccination_records WHERE vaccination_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT location_name, location_address, location_city, location_state FROM vaccination_locations WHERE location_state = 'CA';
SELECT person_id, age, gender, region FROM population_demographics WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT person_id, age, vaccination_status FROM population_demographics WHERE age >= 60 ORDER BY age ASC, vaccination_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_records;
SELECT patient_id, vaccine_type, vaccination_date FROM vaccination_records WHERE vaccination_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT center_name, location, contact_number FROM vaccination_centers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT log_id, vaccine_type, vaccination_date, patient_id, center_id FROM vaccination_logs WHERE vaccination_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM vaccination_records WHERE vaccine_type = 'Pfizer' ORDER BY vaccination_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT center_name, location, contact_number FROM vaccination_centers ORDER BY center_name;
SELECT patient_id, center_id, vaccination_date FROM vaccination_logs WHERE vaccination_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY vaccination_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, vaccine_type, vaccination_date, location FROM patients p JOIN vaccination_logs vl ON p.patient_id = vl.patient_id JOIN vaccination_centers vc ON vl.center_id = vc.center_id WHERE vaccine_type = 'Moderna';
SELECT * FROM vaccination_records;
SELECT patient_id, vaccine_name, vaccination_date FROM vaccination_records ORDER BY vaccination_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT center_name, location FROM vaccination_centers WHERE location='California';
SELECT * FROM vaccination_records WHERE vaccination_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY gender DESC, date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT vaccine_name, vaccination_date FROM vaccination_records WHERE vaccination_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE LENGTH(location) > 10 ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, vaccine_name, appointment_date FROM vaccination_schedule WHERE completed = TRUE ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
